current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to conduct a study on matters relating to the burial
			 of unclaimed remains of veterans in national cemeteries, and for other
			 purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Dignified Interment of Our Veterans Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dignified Interment of Our Veterans Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Department of Veterans Affairs study on matters relating to burial of unclaimed
			 remains of veterans in national cemeteries

text.#text: Not later than one year after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

complete a study on matters relating to the interring of unclaimed
			 remains of veterans in national cemeteries under the control of the

with respect to the study required

text.#text: The matters studied under subsection (a)(1) shall include the following:

Determining the scope of issues relating to unclaimed remains of veterans, including an estimate of
			 the number of unclaimed remains of veterans.

for working
